name: treejs
author: Winkler Fabien <fabien.winkler@outlook.fr>
description: TreeJS is a TypeScript library for creating and manipulating tree structures in JavaScript applications. It provides a simple and efficient way to manage hierarchical data, making it easy to build features like file explorers, organizational charts, and more.

scripts.build:api: npx typedoc --excludePrivate --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs/docs/api src/**/*.ts && cp dist/* docs/static
scripts.publish: git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish --access public
scripts.release: npm run build && commit-and-tag-version && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && standard-version --release-as patch && npm run publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && standard-version --release-as minor && npm run publish
scripts.release:major: npm run build && standard-version --release-as major && npm run publish
